about_the_game:
Starlight: Eye of The Storm - Demo


Welcome to Starlight: Eye of the The Storm! A demo has been prepared for you to try the game before deciding whether or not to purchase.

What is Starlight:Eye of The Storm


This is a retro-style Arcade vertical shooter with special powers, upgrade-able weapons and your skills can yield additional rewards, like Promethane Capsules which is the only currency usable to upgrade your weapons. Drift around automatically like a pro around your targets and take them on with style. You can get your friends to join you on Steam Remote Play or at the comfort of your home up to 3 players. (Maximum 2 players on keyboard, 1 player on a controller or all 3 players using controllers)

What's in the demo?


The demo consist of 4 full Arcade Mode stages and has weapons unlocked till the same point. The demo does not end; upon completion of Stage 4 and exiting the weapon shop, you'll start from Stage 1 again with all score, money and capsules reset to 0 but you'll still retain all your weapons.

You'll also attain local achievements but they'll not be synced with Steam's achievements for your record and neither will Steam Cloud be available for saved games or configuration.

What'll be in the Early Access Release


Firstly, our Early Access is meant to collect precious feedback from early adopters that will help us better shape the final release. To begin, let's preview what the early access version will have:

  • Full game with 10 arcade mode stage
  • Access to ALL 60 different weapons
  • Access to ALL 9 ship upgrades
  • Fully functional Custom Ship Editor with Steam Workshop enabled
  • Steam Cloud to store your saved games and configuration
  • Full set of attainable achievements that is synced with Steam achievements

Conclusion


We hope you'll enjoy the game regardless of whether you decide to purchase or not in the end. If there's anything we can improve, please do not hesitate to let us know.

Thanks and enjoy!
From the Starlight Team

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3-5XXX CPU or higher with support for SSE3 instructions
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI R7 250 or GeForce GTI 940MX or similar card that supports shader v3.0 with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX / DirectSound Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Windows NT/Server versions not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5-6500 or higher with support for SSE instructions.
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon RX 580 or GeForce GTX 1650 and above that supports shader v3.0 with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX / DirectSound Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Windows NT/Server versions not supported

short_description: Starlight - Eye of the Storm DemoWelcome! This is a no-frills, free-to-play retro Arcade bullet hell shooter with 4 full stages and up to 3 players. Keyboard and Joystick supported. Upgrade your weapons, drift around your enemies and unleash the special power from the within!
